## Cisco-IOS-XR-um-if-service-policy-qos-cfg.yang

- [XPaths Obsoleted](#xpaths-obsoleted)
- [XPaths Deprecated](#xpaths-deprecated)
- [XPaths Added](#xpaths-added)
- [XPaths Removed](#xpaths-removed)
- [XPaths Modified](#xpaths-modified)

### Description

Added augmentation to um-interface-cfg:interfaces/interface-preconfigure and to do that, added grouping, which does not really break backward-compatibility. No impact on existing operations.

N/A

## XPaths Removed
